alert.note: Alert for Concho; McCulloch; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:43PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McCulloch, northeastern Menard and southeastern Concho Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Us-190 Near The Menard- Mcculloch County Line, or 11 miles northeast of Menard, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brady, Melvin, Brady Lake, Calf Creek, Us-190 Near The Menard- Mcculloch County Line and The Intersection Of Us- 190 And Ranch Road 1311. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
